channel.title: Python on Python学习
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Python学习

item.title: MySQLdb操作
item.description: # 查询数据库 import MySQLdb conn = MySQLdb.connect( host='localhost', user='root', passwd='root', db='test', charset='utf8' ) c = conn.cursor() c.execute("select * from student") rows = c.fetchall() for item in rows: print(item) # 数据库插入 import MySQLdb conn = MySQLdb.connect( host='localhost', user='root', passwd='root', db='test', charset='utf8' ) c = conn.cursor() c.execute("insert into student (sid,sname,sage,ssex) values('09','汪晓康','19920812','男')") conn.commit() rows = c.fetchall() for item in rows: print(item)
